name: The Packager
description:
Collect and deliver the packages as fast as you can before they drop down the chute getting destroyed instantly, once 5 packages are destroyed it's GAME OVER.

This game took me over 2 months and is my very first VR project. Please leave any feedback on what I could improve on for future releases of upcoming games of mine. If there are any issues please leave a comment and I'll try and respond as fast as possible. This wouldn't be possible without PlayMakers help, huge thanks to them.

(Tested for the HTC VIVE and 100% stable. Unknown to other headsets but if any problems please let me know)

Check out my Youtube channel and Twitter to see development for my current and upcoming games!
